docs.lead_paragraph: THE question sounds so simple: Do men today have fewer sperm than their forebears? And the answer seems easy to get: Just look at sperm counts at different time periods. But such an exercise is fraught with peril, as the highly specialized medical experts called andrologists well know.

headline.main: Ideas & Trends;How Men Measure Up, Sperm for Sperm
